short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get only what you want out of a recipe page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Recisee extension pulls relevant information from bloated recipe sites.  Select the extension and click Get Recipe to open a new window with the recipe title, URL of the page, ingredient list, instructions, and a button to download the recipe.
